none.description: Default shadow for most content and UI elements

small.description: Reduced shadow for secondary UI elements

medium.description: Standard shadow for UI elements like cards and buttons

large.description: Larger shadow for emphasis. Use sparingly

default.description: Default fill colour for primary buttons

hover.description: Fill colour used when user hovers over primary button

disabled.description: Fill colour for inactive primary buttons

default.description: Default fill colour for buttons in danger/warning state

hover.description: Fill colour used when user hovers over danger/warning button

disabled.description: Default fill colour for disabled danger/warning button

default.description: Default theme colour for components and layout

hover.description: Fill colour used when user hovers over secondary button

disabled.description: Fill colour for inactive secondary buttons

default.description: Light theme colour for components and layout
Default fill colour for tertiary buttons

hover.description: Fill colour used when user hovers over tertiary button

disabled.description: Fill colour for inactive tertiary buttons

default.description: Alternative light theme colour for components and layout
Default fill colour for menu items

hover.description: Fill colour used when user hovers over a menu item

default.description: Default fill colour for form/input fields

disabled.description: Fill colour for inactive/disabled form/input fields

default.description: Lighter border colour for UI elements

medium.description: Default border colour for UI elements

dark.description: Used as a hover colour for form fields and inputs

active.description: Used as the active stroke colour for UI elements

default.description: Background overlay colour for images and modal dialogues

danger.description: Background colour for error, failure or danger messages
Border stroke for error, failure or danger messages

info.description: Emphasis colour for icons in general/informational state

danger.description: Emphasis colour for icons in error, failure or danger state

success.description: Emphasis colour for icons in success state

warning.description: Emphasis colour for icons in warning state

primaryInvert.description: Default colour for icons on dark backgrounds

bc-sans.description: BC Sans font. Requires BC Sans package

auto.description: System token, used to generate type styles

regular.description: System token, used to generate text styles

bold.description: System token, used to generate text styles

italic.description: System token, used to generate text styles

0.description: System token, used to generate type styles
System token, used to generate type styles

display.description: Extra-large body text size. Do not use for headings

largeBody.description: Larger text size for body text (bolded)

H6.description: Default style for Heading 6. Includes all sizing/spacing values for H6

H5.description: Default style for Heading 6. Includes all sizing/spacing values for H5

H4.description: Default style for Heading 6. Includes all sizing/spacing values for H4

H3.description: Default style for Heading 6. Includes all sizing/spacing values for H3

H2.description: Default style for Heading 6. Includes all sizing/spacing values for H2

H1.description: Default style for Heading 6. Includes all sizing/spacing values for H1

display.description: Extra-large font size (bolded). Do not use for headings

largeBody.description: Larger text size for body text (italic)

display.description: Extra-large font size (italic). Do not use for headings

none.description: System token, used to generate type styles

0.description: System token, used to generate type styles

primary.description: Default colour for all body text and headings

placeholder.description: Use for placeholder text in forms

disabled.description: Use only for text in inactive user interface elements

link.description: Use for hyperlinks in body text and headings

danger.description: Use for error, failure or danger message text

primaryInvert.description: Default colour for text on dark backgrounds

secondaryInvert.description: Secondary colour for text on dark backgrounds
